page.title: 04Brownies and Guides
page.content: In Salfords village there are{2 {Brownie units and 1 Guide company. Brownie unit consists of 24 Brownies and leaders called Brown Owl and Tawny Owl.The Brownies are divided into sixes' with Sixer and Seconder in each six.Age range 7 years -10 years, then transfer to Guide company run by Captain and children in patrols. Brownies is very popular.They meet in {Guide/ Brownie Hall,}Tuesday and Wednesday nights 6-7.30 p.m.Activities include games, cooking, craft, ventures, entertaining, working for Interest Badges. This year have been doing project on Sri Lanka. After 6 weeks, take Promise and become full member of Brownie Unit:{"think of {others before ourselves and do a good {turn every day". }
